weloveclouds.commons.networking.models.requests

Interface IRequestFactory<M,R extends IExecutable<M> & IValidatable<R>>

  • Type Parameters:
    M - the type of the message the server accepts
    R - the type of the request which shall be created from M
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    KVClientRequestFactory, KVECSRequestFactory, KVTransferRequestFactory, TransactionReceiverService

    public interface IRequestFactory<M,R extends IExecutable<M> & IValidatable<R>>
    Common abstraction for the different request factories.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      R createRequestFromReceivedMessage(M receivedMessage, ICallbackRegister callbackRegister) 

    • Method Detail

      • createRequestFromReceivedMessage

        R createRequestFromReceivedMessage(M receivedMessage,
                                   ICallbackRegister callbackRegister)
        Parameters:
        receivedMessage - the message that shall be progressed
        callbackRegister - where a callback can be registered which will be executed AFTER sending the response message to the recipient
        Returns:
        the response message
